body.p:
State of New York
County of Kings

I, Julius R. Pomeroy duly appointed by the Governor of the State of Kentucky, a Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky, resident in the City of Brooklyn in the State of New York, do Solemnly swear that I will well and truly Execute and perform all the duties of my station as such Commissioner under and by virtue of the laws of said State of Kentucky.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 7th day of April A.D. 1865

Gordon L. Ford
Commissioner for Kentucky
In and for the State of New York
In the margin is a impression of my official seal used by me as a Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky in New York.
